doc.title: Nanize — PFAS-free nano technology
About Us — Nanize
doc.content: Nanize is a Norwegian company developing sustainable, durable nano-technology coatings. Leaders in rapidly curing polysilazane technology. Team highlights: Håvard Lillebo (Founder & CFO), Dr. Kingsley Iwu (Founder & CTO), David Hogg (CEO), Jerry Stokes (CCO). Mission: revolutionize surface technology through sustainable innovation. Technology: nano-particles covalently bonded to polymer backbone; PFAS‑free; customizable for anti-adhesion, non-wetting, very low coefficient of friction. Ultra‑rapid fully hard curing < 30 seconds below 100°C validated by FTIR. Integrates into industrial processes for steel, aluminium, glass, plastic.
